body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Charles Lopez and I'm a customer service agent at Alpha Motors, how can I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sara. Before we proceed, may I please verify your date of birth for security purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's zero four zero six one nine eight eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sara. Can you also provide me with the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's seven eight five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for confirming, Sara. Is there a specific issue you're facing with our Car Dealership returns that I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm feeling frustrated with the return process

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear about your experience, Sara. We will work on resolving this for you. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Is there anything else you would like to share with me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Sara. We will address your concerns promptly. Have a great day ahead.
